variable.name: Premie
variable.value: Child delivered prematurely (<37 weeks gestational age)

variable.name: pre_atb
variable.description: Maternal antibiotics used during the admission resulting in this delivery.
variable.value: Trial in which admission of drug was blinded

variable.name: ante_hem
variable.comment: Placenta previa, abruption or threatened abortion resulting in bleeding, which can be external (vaginal bleeding) or occult (retroplacental clot), other than bloody show, is documented after 20 weeks of pregnancy.

variable.name: apgar5_5
variable.comment: Use the official five minute Apgar score as assigned in the delivery room.

variable.name: birthweight
variable.description: The birth weight of the child in grams as recorded in the chart.

variable.name: blind
variable.description: Blind - no functional vision in child.

variable.name: deaf
variable.description: Child is deaf in both ears, requires hearing aids

variable.name: site6_delivery
variable.description: Whether or not there was a C-section.

variable.name: gaweek
variable.comment: Record the best estimate of gestational age using the following hierarchy: 1) Best OB estimate/obstetrical measures based on last menstrual period, obstetrical parameters, and/or early prenatal ultrasound as recorded in the maternal chart. 2) Best neonatologist estimate/neonatologist's estimate based on physical criteria, neurologic examination, combined physical and gestational age exam (Ballard or Dubowitz), or examination of the lens.

variable.name: grav
variable.description: The number of mother's confirmed pregnancies, including this one.

variable.name: ethnic
variable.comment: Hispanic includes person of Cuban, Mexican, Puerto Rican, South or Central American, or other Spanish culture or origin, regardless of race. The term, 'Spanish origin', can be used in addition to 'Hispanic or Latino'.

variable.name: hyper_pre_eclamp
variable.comment: Hypertension, pregnancy induced, is specifically recorded in the mother's chart. The standard definition of hypertension is maternal BP above 140 systolic or 90 diastolic; these values were recorded prior to or during the present pregnancy on at least 2 occasions.

variable.name: site1/5/6_iddm
variable.description: Diabetes mellitus requiring insulin for control is diagnosed during or prior to present pregnancy.

variable.name: site6_IVHGR
variable.description: Most severe grade of intraventricular hemorrhage in child.

variable.name: length_36wk
variable.comment: Record the length in centimeters at 36 weeks (+/- 7 days) gestational age.

variable.name: length
variable.description: The length in centimeters, as recorded on the admission physical (within 72 hours of birth).

variable.name: late_sepsis
variable.description: Child had late onset culture positive septicemia/bacteremia.
variable.comment: Positive culture of blood, obtained in the presence of compatible clinical signs of septicemia, occurring after 72 hours.

variable.name: maternal_age
variable.comment: Age in completed years at the time of delivery.

variable.name: site1/6_NEC
variable.comment: Used the Modified Bell's Staging Criteria for NEC in Appendix G. Also refer to Appendix I. Coded as 'no' (Absent/Suspect) when there is no necrotizing enterocolitis present or in the presence Bell's Stage IA or IB. Coded as 'yes' if Stages IIA, IIB, IIIA, or IIIB.

variable.name: site6_mult_birth
variable.description: Pregnancy resulted in a multiple birth.

variable.name: ofc
variable.comment: The head circumference in centimeters as recorded (within 72 hours of birth): 1) On the admission physical exam form. 2) On the nursery admission record. 3) The pathology report if the infant died.

variable.name: ofc_36wk
variable.description: Head circumference at 36 weeks gestational age.

variable.name: para
variable.description: The number of products of conception delivered after 20 weeks gestation, resulting in the live birth of a child, including this delivery.

variable.name: pda
variable.comment: Clinical evidence of left to right PDA shunt documented by continuous murmur, hyperdynamic precordium, bounding pulses, wide pulse pressure, congestive heart failure, increased pulmonary vasculature or cardiomegaly by CXR, and/or increased oxygen requirement or ECHO evidence of PDA with documentation of left to right ductal shunting.

variable.name: pre_care
variable.description: Mother had at least one prenatal care visit.
variable.comment: Mother has evidence of at least one prenatal care visit for this pregnancy.

variable.name: race
variable.comment: Same as mother's race. Black includes a person having origins in any of the black racial groups of Africa. Terms such as 'Haitian' or 'Negro' can be used in addition to 'Black or African American'. 'White' includes a person having origins in any of the original peoples of Europe, the Middle East, or North Africa.

variable.name: rom_hours
variable.description: Duration of rupture of membranes in hours.

variable.name: rop
variable.description: Child diagnosed with any retinopathy of prematurity.

variable.name: seiz
variable.description: Seizures treated with an anti-convulsant for > 72 hours.

variable.name: cong
variable.description: Any syndromes and/or major malformations were observed, including Down's syndrome, chromosomal abnormalities, and other syndromes with multi-organ involvement.

variable.name: toco
variable.description: Tocolytics used in the admission resulting in this delivery.
variable.value: Trial in which admission of drug was blinded

variable.name: weight_36wk
variable.description: Child's weight at 36 weeks gestational age.
variable.comment: Record the weight in grams at 36 weeks (+/-7 days) gestational age.
